short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to find events on webpages and turn them into Google calendar events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extensions uses LLMs to identify events described on a page in Chrome. The events are extracted, along with a sensible description and date and time, and automatically added to the user's calendar.
